review: Drawful 2 is one of the only standalone Jackbox games, and it's definitely still worth it even despite being a standalone. Infact, I think this actually went free once during COVID and that was definitely a good decision on Jackbox Games' part. This party game is just pure fun. You get a random prompt to draw out to the best of your ability with only 2 colours and no erasers because who needs those, like seriously I see a few people backlash this game for not having an eraser when the whole point is that the drawings are going to be awful, thats literally the fun of the game. Then you are shown other players drawings and you have to come up with a convincing prompt and also guess the correct prompt, repeat for each player, do it again in a 2nd round, and whoever gets the most points wins. It's like Fibbage from other packs except with drawing thrown in instead of facts.  Drawful 2 is honestly on par with Drawful Animate from Pack 8 for me, so I'd say its pretty fair to give both games a shot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198174142818', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1703386280}
review:
Drawful 2? More like Dreadful 2. This game is a classic example of a sequel that fails to live up to its predecessor. It’s a drawing game, but the fun ends there. The controls are clunky and unresponsive, making the simple act of drawing feel like a chore.

The game’s humor tries to be dark and edgy, but it mostly just falls flat. The voice acting is subpar, and the story is a confusing mess that tries to be quirky and ends up just being nonsensical.

And let’s talk about the game’s biggest sin: its lack of depth. There’s no exploration, no side quests, no character customization. You just go from one puzzle to the next with nothing to break up the monotony. It’s an RPG stripped down to its bare bones, and the result is a game that’s as shallow as it is strange.

In short, Drawful 2 is a game that tries to be different, but ends up being different for all the wrong reasons. It’s a frustrating, confusing, and ultimately unsatisfying experience. If you’re looking for a good puzzle game, I’d recommend looking elsewhere.

review:
While I feel like Drawful 2 could benefit from being packaged in a bundle alongside some of the other Party Packs, at its core, Drawful 2 is a really solid improvement over the original Drawful. Firstly, the host is more charismatic and quirky with how they present themselves to the players. I can feel the personality of the host in this game compared to the original Drawful. There's also an audience feature with this game. The audience is able to vote on what they think the original title is and like a title that they think was funny. An update roughly around 2021 added subtitles to the game, which is a good parity change from the newer packs to give to a game from 2016. User-generated content has also been added to allow for a more refreshed palette of prompts that may or may not be quirky at best. Then there's the fact that you now have two colors to work with, which can help give some part of your drawing some distinction. Not to mention the fact that there's now a better soundtrack involved, and this game has me going great.

Drawful 2 is a worthwhile experience, and it has enough going for it alone that even Drawful: Animate, which I also really like, can stand out on its own to be played in comparison to the Fibbage, Quiplash, Trivia Murder Party, and Tee K.O. franchise. Please consider picking this game up if you want the best Drawful experience out there!

review:
Drawful 2 es un juego de fiesta que promete diversión y risas, y en su mayoría, cumple con esas expectativas. Sin embargo, como cualquier juego, tiene sus pros y contras.

En el lado positivo, la premisa del juego es simple pero efectiva. Los jugadores reciben frases o conceptos extraños que deben representar mediante dibujos. La simplicidad del juego lo hace accesible para casi cualquier persona, independientemente de su experiencia con los videojuegos. La posibilidad de personalizar las palabras y frases es una característica destacada, ya que permite que el juego sea más relevante y divertido para tu grupo de amigos.

La interacción social es el punto fuerte de Drawful 2. Ver los dibujos torpes y a menudo hilarantes de tus amigos y tratar de adivinar qué están representando es garantía de risas y momentos cómicos. La capacidad de engañar a tus amigos con respuestas falsas agrega un elemento estratégico al juego.

Sin embargo, Drawful 2 no es perfecto. La calidad de la experiencia depende en gran medida de la creatividad y el sentido del humor de los jugadores. En algunos grupos, esto puede llevar a momentos menos divertidos si los jugadores no son especialmente ingeniosos o creativos.

Además, el juego puede volverse repetitivo después de varias partidas, ya que las mecánicas básicas no cambian significativamente. Si bien es ideal para romper el hielo en reuniones o fiestas, es posible que no ofrezca la profundidad de juego de otros títulos.

review: Drawful 2 is way too expensive, yes. But it adds one thing to Drawful that truly elevates it to a new level: player-made prompts! The number one thing you want to do in any game of Drawful is respond to the drawing with some terrible inside joke, but this won't get you points because the terrible inside joke won't be a prompt the Jackbox writers provided. When you've just written the prompts - and you can do this collaboratively, without seeing everybody else's - [i]any[/i] terrible joke could be the actual prompt, which incentivises you to make guesses which are much funnier. It's one of those Jackbox games, in my view, that transcends just being good and has led to some of the most memorable experiences I've had in any game, ever. Recommended for friend groups with a lot of terrible inside jokes to draw from.

review:
Drawful 2 : By Triple F

"Drawful 2" is an absolute gem in the world of party games, delivering laughter, creativity, and unforgettable moments in a package that will have you hooked from the very first doodle. As a seasoned gamer who's tried their fair share of party games, I can confidently say that "Drawful 2" is a masterpiece in its genre.

The premise of "Drawful 2" is deceptively simple: you and your friends draw ridiculous prompts on your smartphones or tablets, and then you guess what those drawings represent. Sounds easy, right? Wrong! The beauty of "Drawful 2" lies in its unpredictability. You never know what strange and hilarious prompts you'll be tasked with illustrating, which means every round is a new chance to unleash your inner artist.

What truly sets "Drawful 2" apart is the uncontrollable laughter it generates. Whether you're an aspiring Picasso or a doodling disaster, the resulting drawings are guaranteed to be sidesplitting. Trying to decipher your friends' chaotic scribbles is a riot in itself, leading to outbursts of laughter that will leave your cheeks sore by the end of the night.

"Drawful 2" is incredibly accessible, even for non-gamers. The intuitive interface on smartphones and tablets ensures that anyone can pick up and play, making it the perfect game for parties and gatherings. The game's simplicity hides a layer of strategic depth, though. It's not just about drawing well; it's about understanding your friends' thought processes and trying to outsmart them with your guesses.

One of the standout features of "Drawful 2" is its robust customization options. You can create your own prompts, which means you can tailor the game to your group's sense of humor or inside jokes. This feature adds a personal touch that makes every game unique and memorable.

In this era of online streaming and virtual hangouts, "Drawful 2" shines. It's perfect for streaming to a live audience, as they can join the game as "audience members" and vote on their favorite drawings and guesses. This interactive element adds a new layer of excitement and engagement to the experience.

While "Drawful 2" is nearly perfect, a few more drawing tools or an expanded color palette wouldn't hurt. It's always fun to have more options to bring your artistic vision to life. Additionally, an even larger player limit would be fantastic for larger gatherings, although it's already accommodating for most groups.

"Drawful 2" is the life of the party, the ultimate icebreaker, and the source of endless entertainment. Its blend of creativity, humor, and accessibility make it a must-have in any gamer's library. Whether you're playing with friends in the same room or virtually connecting with loved ones, "Drawful 2" will create memories that you'll cherish for years to come. If you haven't experienced the joy of this game yet, it's high time you joined the doodling revolution. Get ready to laugh until your sides ache, and let "Drawful 2" transform your gatherings into unforgettable, artistic adventures.

[h1]Solte sua criatividade em Drawful 2[/h1]

[b]Avaliação do jogo: Drawful 2[/b]

Drawful 2 é um jogo de festa e criatividade que promove muita diversão e risadas entre amigos e familiares. Avaliaremos Drawful 2 como uma experiência envolvente e cativante, que incentiva a expressão artística e a interação social.

[b]Jogo de festa criativo[/b]
Drawful 2 é ideal para ser jogado em festas ou encontros sociais, pois oferece uma experiência multiplayer empolgante. Os jogadores são desafiados a criar desenhos engraçados e criativos em seus dispositivos para que os outros adivinhem.

[b]Desenhos engraçados e divertidos[/b]
Os jogadores são apresentados a prompts malucos e inusitados para desenharem. As interpretações únicas e engraçadas dos prompts geram momentos hilários e garantem muitas gargalhadas durante o jogo.

[b]Interação social[/b]
Drawful 2 incentiva a interação social, pois os jogadores precisam adivinhar os desenhos uns dos outros e fazer suposições engraçadas. A atmosfera descontraída e amigável do jogo cria um ambiente propício para a diversão e a camaradagem.

[b]Facilidade de jogar[/b]
O jogo é fácil de aprender e jogar, tornando-o acessível para jogadores de todas as idades e habilidades. A simplicidade das mecânicas permite que todos se divirtam sem a necessidade de conhecimentos técnicos avançados.

[b]Variedade de desenhos e prompts[/b]
Drawful 2 oferece uma grande variedade de prompts e desenhos, o que significa que cada partida é única e surpreendente. A diversidade de temas e desafios mantém o jogo fresco e emocionante mesmo após várias sessões.

[b]Conclusão[/b]
Drawful 2 é uma experiência de festa criativa e divertida que proporciona risadas e momentos inesquecíveis entre amigos e familiares. Com sua jogabilidade simples, desenhos engraçados e interação social, o jogo é uma excelente opção para animar qualquer encontro social. Se você está em busca de diversão descontraída e criativa, Drawful 2 é uma escolha recomendada.

[b]Nota: 9/10[/b]

review:
Drawful 2 - это захватывающая игра для нескольких игроков, которая превратит вашу вечеринку в настоящий карнавал творчества и веселья. Игра представляет собой цифровую версию классической игры "угадай, что я нарисовал" и является продолжением популярного Drawful.

Одним из ключевых элементов Drawful 2 является его простота. Для игры вам потребуется только смартфон или планшет, подключенные к интернету. Каждый игрок выбирает персонажа и вводит свое имя, после чего на экране устройства отображается комната с уникальным кодом, который игроки должны ввести, чтобы присоединиться к игре. Это позволяет легко подключиться к игре и начать играть всего за несколько минут.

Игра состоит из нескольких раундов, в каждом из которых игрокам предлагается нарисовать что-то на своем устройстве в соответствии с заданием, которое они получают. После этого все рисунки перемешиваются и показываются на экране вместе с фальшивыми вариантами, созданными самой игрой. Задача игроков - угадать, какой из предложенных рисунков был создан самим автором задания. Здесь возникает много смешных ситуаций, так как игроки пытаются обмануть друг друга и угадать правильный ответ.

Drawful 2 отличается от своего предшественника новыми функциями и улучшениями. В игре добавлены новые задания, слова и фразы, что делает каждую игру свежей и уникальной. Также появилась возможность рисовать с помощью движения, что добавляет еще больше веселья в игровой процесс. Игра также включает режим "Великий финал", где игроки соревнуются за максимальное количество очков в последнем раунде.

Один из главных плюсов Drawful 2 - это его способность создавать невероятно смешные ситуации и моменты. Когда игроки рисуют на своих устройствах, они обычно ограничены по времени и пытаются передать свои мысли и идеи максимально быстро и точно. Это приводит к курьезным и забавным рисункам, которые становятся предметом обсуждения и смеха.

Графика в игре проста, но яркая и красочная. Она идеально подходит для создания беззаботной и веселой атмосферы на вечеринке или дружеском собрании. Музыка и звуковые эффекты также дополняют атмосферу игры, добавляя динамики и энергии.

В целом, Drawful 2 - это отличная игра для тех, кто ищет развлечение и веселье в компании друзей или семьи. Она легка в освоении, требует минимального количества подготовки и может привнести множество улыбок и смеха в вашу жизнь. Если вы любите игры на вечеринках или просто хотите провести время с хорошей компанией, Drawful 2 обязательно стоит попробовать.

review: Drawful 2 is the perfect game for a bunch of friends in a call on discord, or in person with your family. The base game is great, with the rules being that one person will draw something and people will have to pick the correct prompt chosen by other players. The website had no issues, and the game was very quick with little to none load times for me. The audience system is extremely fun, but I have not tried out using Twitch with it, so I have reviewed it. I had played this with my cousins and family, and since I have a lot of siblings, I got most of the achievements easily. The base game is great, however many people overlook the make your own section as well. You and other people can create a ruleset, for the prompts you have to draw. The prompts can be hilarious, but if you play the game it could be quite stale since those people remember what they put in. So I would recommend playing a few rounds without the episode. However, one grudge I personally don’t like is the VIP. That the first person who joins can put in an episode and can start the game. I can’t think of any other way to do this, but I hope they change this in the future. In conclusion, Drawful 2 is a great game for friends and family, with lots of fun to be had and minor details that don't affect the game.

review:
Un muy buen juego de dibujo y de fiestas. Drawful es básicamente un Fibbage con dibujos. No hay mucho más que decir. Algunos de mis amigos no les parece muy divertido al no haber tantas risas, pero a mí me parece muy entretenido.

Además, este es el segundo juego en ser traducido de forma oficial en varios idiomas. A pesar de nuevamente tener solo español de España, esta traducción está mucho mejor que la traducción realizada en Quiplash 2 InterLASHional. Muy pocos enunciados realmente llegan a arruinar la experiencia. Se nota que la traducción aquí fue mucho más neutral.

De igual modo, este juego es ideal para jugar con la [url=traducciones.jackbox.lol]adaptación no oficial al latino,[/url] que incluye un doblaje completo.
